name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: noXads - Hide Twitter ads - Twitter (x.com) Ad Blocker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This lightweight extension hides ads on Twitter (x.com), providing you with a cleaner, distraction-free timeline from the moment it's installed. 
No configuration needed â€” just add the extension and enjoy Twitter (x.com) without ads. Browse, tweet, and interact on the platform with a smoother, more focused experience. 
Perfect for users who want to cut through the noise and engage with the content that matters most to them.

After installing the extension, make sure to refresh the page.
